title: Pao Pao Xiang Qian Chong
synopsis: The Mengla Continent has been guarded by just and kind artillery soldiers since ancient times. An evil army called the Du Hei Army quickly emerged on the Mengla Continent, eroding the peaceful and peaceful homeland with violence. Five passionate teenagers have dreams of joining the artillery recruit barracks. The witty guns, the slow guns, the nonsensical triplets, under the leadership of the "devil" platoon leader-Posir, interpret a funny story about military dreams, persistence, joy, tears, and growth (translated form iqiyi)

title: Shouhu Jingling
synopsis: The Black Hammer gang is a high-tech thieves gang with powerful weapons and combat robots. They vowed to steal all "the most beautiful things in the world". They stole the invention of the scientist Dr. Bai and did evil everywhere, and even brought greed to sustain. The earth's natural and harmonious spirit paradise-Bodhi Island. The Black Hammer gang kidnapped the elves and ventured to use dangerous lasers to turn the elves into cruel monsters one by one...Monchi, the guardian of the Bodhi island elves, and Dr. Bai’s daughter Nan have a common goal-save nature and rescue the elves We are determined to join forces to pursue this group of thieves, thus embarking on a moving adventure, showing the eternal theme of wisdom, courage and unity, and also highlighting the true meaning of human beings should live in harmony with nature. (translated from douban)

title: Youji Shen Bing
synopsis: "Guerilla Warriors" mainly tells the story of a remote mountain village on the North China Plain in the period of the War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression. There were three kind, cute, witty and brave children: Xiaolong, Xiaofeng and Big Tiger. Under the guidance and inspiration of the Eighth Route Army guerrilla captain Lin Dong, and with the assistance of the highly powerful but hidden Jin Dabao, the three of them formed a juvenile guerrilla team to protect the villagers, rescue the captured and wounded, escort intelligence agents, and cooperate with the Eighth Route Army. The large force crushed the enemy's many sweeps, launched a thrilling contest with the enemy, and wrote a legendary story of the heroic resistance of Chinese young people. (translated from douban)

title: Mo Di Qiyu Ji
synopsis: "Magic Flute" tells the story of a young heroic adventure full of suspense. An ordinary teenage boy on Venice Beach, California, became the heir to a terrible legacy by chance. A flute that has been sleeping for 3000 years and has unlimited magical power. 　　 When Justin discovered this flute, which was lost 3,000 years ago, he did not expect that it would change his young life forever. He and his friends are involved in the lives of a group of magical creatures who follow the call of Justin's flute and fly across the sky and over the ocean to carry out the orders of their young flute master. Many pterodactyls, sea snakes, phoenixes, and seahorses appeared on the beach and on the skateboard. The magician, emperor, and princess also woke up from a three-thousand-year slumber and continued their struggle for the magic flute since ancient times. Now this flute belongs to Justin, but the magician will steal it at all costs. In the battle between Justin and the magician, the whole world becomes an arena of good magic and evil witchcraft. Their competition is manifested as fascinating visual effects, light-hearted humor and thrilling scenes that are appetizing. (translated form douban)

title: Yi Tang Piyingxi Chengyu Gushi
synopsis: A Mu and A Shui are two children with opposite personalities. Amu often misuses idioms, and Ah Shui has to correct the idioms that Amu used wrong. This film uses shadow puppets, supplemented with humorous elements, to interpret some of the more famous idioms, breaking through the traditional preaching concept, and enabling children or adults to acquire knowledge and interest in the story. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Jingling
synopsis: The story tells the story of the protagonist Luo Xiaobu selling his pleasure to the buyer scrolls in the Worry Country in exchange for 100 points for each exam, winning every game and two different flavors of ice cream every day. But he found that it would not help to lose happiness and have more desires. Therefore, Luo Xiaobu let Majuan make himself smaller and embarked on a hard journey of finding happiness with his new friend Moon Dog. In the process of searching for happiness, get acquainted with three lively happy elves, and finally defeat the King of Sorrowful Nations together! Luo Xiaobu also really understood the meaning of happiness, and knew how important happiness is! (translated from douban)

title: Mao Er Shan de guǐzi bīng
synopsis: The story of a group of children fighting devils, and there are also opinions that being too cute will affect the views of the teenagers on the war against Japan. In 2006, CCTV excellent animation recommended repertoire (translated from douban)

title: Long Wa
synopsis: Bailong, one of the nine sons of the Dragon King of the East China Sea, has a strong rebellious psychology and great ambition. After he ran away from home, he subdued the monsters such as Yinchan Master and Pikeba. Under their encouragement, he harmed the world. Claiming to dominate the world. In order to improve his skills, Bailong stole the Sun Orb and kidnapped Long Baby's father, Carpenter Li, and asked Carpenter Li to create a "sun treasure box" for him to hold the sun orb. 　　 After the Sun Orb was lost, disasters continued on the world, and the people fell into dire straits. In order to get rid of those monsters, save the people, and rescue her father, Longwa embarked on an adventure. Along the way, he defeated the cruel pike tyrant, thick boa constrictor, ferocious boar and other monsters. The scene was thrilling and exciting. With the indomitable struggle, the firm belief in victory and the perseverance, the monsters and ghosts were finally eliminated, people were rescued, and the world restored peace again. (translated from douban)

title: Du Jiao Leyuan
synopsis: It tells a story that takes place in a city where all one-legged people live. The kind-hearted one-legged people, the brave one-legged fighters and the vicious one-legged dignitaries live here, interpreting the ups and downs and grudges of life. The one-legged city in large-scale industrial production is full of enthusiasm, tension and order; however, the seemingly peaceful life is undercurrents. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tianshang Diao Xia Ge Zhubajie
synopsis: Marshal Tianpeng coveted Fairy Chang'e's beauty and courageously pursued it, so he was punished by the Jade Emperor. During the escort, Marshal Tianpeng broke free from the shackles and tried to escape, but he accidentally hit and reborn as a pig. The land inadvertently overturned the magic weapon "Ganoderma Lucidum Dew" of Guanyin Bodhisattva, and the Ganoderma Lucidum was sprinkled on the head of the Marshal Canopy. From then on, there was a pig-headed Pig Bajie. 　　 Zhu Bajie came to Heaven to avenge himself, but because of his gluttonous habits, he had a dispute with his former partner, Foday, and Foday was demoted to the world. The land invited Zhu Bajie to be the security guard in his temple, and Zhu Bajie drove away the wild boars who often caused trouble, but could not deal with the cunning mice. Foday and Zhu Bajie seem to be happy with each other, and they fight each other to tear down the stage, triggering a scene of hilarious laughter.translated from douban(

title: Kǎlā yuèduì
synopsis: The story of this animation series unfolds with the adventures of four cute birds: Plucky, Toots, Groovy and Basher; they are the famous karaoke band in the town of Melody, continuing the journey of music performance at the next stop. The Kara Band is a free and easy troupe, they bring joy to everyone through music. They went to many places and found many interesting objects. The magical musical magic of the Kara band gives these objects life, so these objects can describe their names and why we need them through catchy chanting and simple dances. The karaoke team will encounter various magical objects and story experiences in each episode, and inspire them to create a wonderful new song to perform at the end of the plot. (translated from douban)

title: Xiaolong Da Gongfu
synopsis: The protagonist Yang Xiaodou wants to be a kung fu master but is weak, clever but not diligent enough, but he dreams of becoming a kung fu master overnight. Facing the athletic challenges of the school sports team leader Li, Yang Xiaodou and other sports team masters, Xiaodou, with the help of his good brother "Kung Fu Dragon" and the encouragement of his passionate father, found the courage and skills, Xiaodou faced Strong opponents must fight hard! Defeat Big Li in a series of sports games! Realize his dream of being a master!

title: Xiaolong Da Gongfu season5
synopsis: In the fifth season of Xiaolong Kungfu, facing the big rival Li, Yang Xiaodou, with the help of his good brother's little dragon, found the courage (head iron) and skill (by tricks), Xiaodou must fight hard against a powerful opponent! Defeat Big Li in a series of various matches! At the same time, Ji Fei, a reporter from the Future Newspaper of Green Lake City, always wants to make a big news and produce various wonderful stories with the little dragon protecting Green Lake City (Xiaodou).(translated from bilibili)

title: Xiaolong Da Gongfu Zhi Shenlong Zhandui
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 小龙大功夫之神龙战队

title: Nuo Nuo Senlin
synopsis: In the depths of the beautiful Nono jungle, there live the jungle life of the clever protagonist Abu, and his tribal friends. Among them are Kasha who is reckless and rude, Wata who is impatient, and Lisa who is cautious. , The paranoid Masha, the kind and simple primitive female Misha, and the naughty and cute little primitive baby Washa, they hunt in the jungle every day, picking fruits, and have experienced time and time again in the process of unknowingly growing up. Life is adventurous. Also in the depths of the jungle, there is still a clean and elegant Panda Panpan, dirty and scruffy wild boars, a lot of beavers concentrating on building shelters, the ferocious and stupid bear and his little companion fox Lala. In the process of adventure in the jungle, Abu and the others worked together and helped each other to overcome various difficulties in life and mastered a lot of knowledge that is closely related to life! On the other hand, the encounters and growth process of the characters in the film also gave modern young people A lot of profound life enlightenment and sincere educational significance! The film adopts a humorous and humorous way of expression, coupled with three-dimensional and gorgeous computer three-dimensional graphics, which is refreshing! The aftertaste is endless!(translated from douban)

title: Hai Bei Bei
synopsis: The 9-year-old Hai Beibei is a curious and adventurous girl. However, her straightforward and helpful personality has made her popular among her friends. By Hai Beibei, there is always a group of loyal buddies with different personalities. They include: Gu Xiaowen: a cowardly character, a four-eyed boy who likes to talk about things and has a lot of research on strange things; cute and timid, always likes to hide behind Hai Beibei, a doll-like little girl Yi Lanlan; IQ 250 However, he moves slowly and is a wise and foolish obese boy with a ball; he loves to be cool, and Wu Shifei, the former truant king whose highest ideal is to be a real man. This brave and funny group of five, under the leadership of Hai Beibei, has embarked on incredible adventures again and again-helping the lost puppies circle home; in order to protect the 100-year-old tree and Settling down on the old tree, he fought against Chabangbang, a profitable businessman; helped Grandpa Huang use rainbow ramen to revitalize the satiated forest and defeated Dangpurin; defeated the reborn overlord trio; built a secret base to defend the earth; The movie wipes out the evil devil in mind...Although the process is tortuous and thrilling, it is full of fun for Hai Beibei and his friends, because this is childhood. 　　 Friends naturally have opponents. Whether it is Teacher Niu, the head teacher who is disgusting and kind, and acts recklessly and directly, Mo Xiuxiu, the vice squad leader who is tempted by others, or the overlord trio who is bullying, they all love to trouble Hai Beibei. Fortunately, for optimistic Hai Beibei, all difficulties are not a problem, because in Hai Beibei's mind, life is always beautiful. Full of clear and pure colors, striding towards tomorrow, this is the world of Hai Beibei... (translated from douban)

title: Hailuo Wan season1
synopsis: season1 of it

title: Hailuo Wan season3
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Jia You Ernu
synopsis: The animation version of "A Family Has Children" not only retains the original style of the TV series, but also retains the original voice dialogue of "A Family Has Children". The images of the cartoon characters are also based on the live-action version of the TV series. The clever and funny trickster Liu Xing, the little cute Xia Yu who always makes small reports, the obedient girl Xia Xue who is liked by teachers and parents, the verbose mother and the wise dad --They in the cartoons, as familiar and unfamiliar new and old friends, will also bring us laughter and happiness.(translated fomm douban)

title: Xiaokang Kang
synopsis: "Comfortable Life" tells the story of a family of three in a modern Chinese city in 2100, with the rapid development of technology, a happy and young couple and their baby-Kangkang. As the young protagonist Kangkang is in the age of rebellious psychology, he is naturally active, pampered, naughty and timid, and likes to do things that he can't do but do not follow common sense. Kangkang also has a group of lively, cute and clever friends in the kindergarten: the noisy robot alarm clock, the cute little pet egg tart, and the knowledgeable robot dog. Xiaokangkang often makes mistakes with troubles and egg tarts, but every time he can get Lao Lao's rescue and help, so as to turn the danger into danger. Kangkang also has a group of lively, cute, smart children in the kindergarten. Some of them are shy, reserved, some are rude, willful, some are arrogant, arrogant, some are bullying and fearful of evil, and they are brave and fighting. A small world of human nature. As one of them, Kangkang explores scientific knowledge with them and solves different difficulties and problems encountered in life and study.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Wu Buxiang
synopsis: In the legend of all nations, everyone is equal, everyone is free, and there are no worries. The little prince of All Nations has been crying since he landed, because he has 84,000 desires, confusion, and self-righteousness in his heart, but his wisdom and happiness index are blank. Everyone named the little prince Wuxiang. I didn't want to hear that in the world outside Wubu Guo, it is much happier to have money than no money, so he insisted on leaving Wubu Guo to Yuhai City. In desperation, the king asked him to experience the consequences of only pursuing wealth. At the same time, he wanted to reduce his deep desires, confusion, and self-righteousness, and enhance his wisdom and happiness. Everyone wants to merge with Li Qingbo, the grandson of Yuhai Wufeng Group Chairman Li Yongwang, and is involved in the family property dispute. Since then, he has constantly experienced the temptation of the evil and the salvation of the good, and finally realized that wealth does not bring real happiness. In the confrontation between good and evil, the prince was moved by kind actions and the power of the beautiful side of human nature. He walked out of the haze of horror, and at the same time understood that he was involuntarily manipulated by desire, and also ushered in the bright state of mind of a long absence... …(translated from baidu baike)

title: Jin Pingguo
synopsis: In a large city, half of the old city has been transformed into a clean modern community. Duan Zhengshu, who is rigorous and old-fashioned, and Li Meilan, who loves life, gave birth to triplets 22 years ago. Today, the three twin sisters have emerged as slim and fashionable young people. Although they are twin sisters, they have different personalities and appearances; they love life, entertain themselves, and care for their families. Together they staged a young, exciting, vivid, and fashionable life comedy. (translated from douban)

title: Wu Lan Qi Qi Ge
synopsis: "Ulan" means red in Mongolian, and "Qiqige" in Mongolian means flowers. It is the name of the protagonist of the film, two little Mongolian girls. My sister Ulan is 13 years old and my sister Qiqige is 6 years old, meaning they are blooming. The beautiful red flower on the grassland has a beautiful childhood like a flower, and the friendship between the two. This film takes the life of migration and nomadism as the starting point, and takes the story of the little sisters of Ulan Qiqige and the grassland animals as the main line, unfolding a series of stories of adventure and curiosity, lost and rescued. The ecological environment of the grassland is being threatened by all aspects. In the harsh natural environment, between people, between animals and animals, between people and animals, we must consciously maintain ecological balance, unite and help each other, coexist in harmony, and protect our homes. Herdsmen, shepherds, sheep, cattle, and horses form a big family of nomadic life. Due to the harsh living environment, herder families must unite and coexist in order to maintain a better living condition to the utmost extent. All these constitute the national character and tradition of the Mongolian people. As the most important maintainer of the balance of the grassland ecological chain, the wolf has a huge impact on the life and way of thinking of the Mongolian people. ring. The Mongolians attach great importance to the ecological balance of the grassland and the importance of the wolf pack to the ecological protection of the grassland. Because of the socialized nature of wolves, they have similarities with human life in many aspects, and there will be more space to show this in animal stories. At the same time, due to the role of wolves in maintaining and optimizing the grassland ecology, and the simple concept of maintaining grassland ecological balance passed down by the Mongolian herders for thousands of years, we designed the story to design the social relationship between wolves and the social relationship of the crowd. Some comparisons and responses are made, and the Mongolians and wolves are both guardians of the grassland. Although there are local conflicts of interest, they must coexist harmoniously on the overall situation and maintain a balanced living environment. This realistic theme is shown to the audience. Reflects the mainstream consciousness that today's society focuses on building a harmonious symbiosis between man and nature (translated from baidu baike)

title: Zhimou Jiazu
synopsis: The story originated from the decline of the Han Dynasty, the three kingdoms stand together, and the princes established themselves as kings, each occupying one side. Which vassal's adviser is good at strategizing, has the opportunity to reverse the situation, guide the situation, and compete in the Central Plains. As a result, outstanding planners and military strategists emerged one after another, each with their own ingenuity, fighting wits and courage... The story unfolded. On an unusual night, Sun Zhi, a wise man who was watching the stars at night, saw a strange omen. Just as he was about to report to the lord Sun Quanzhi, the Hong Ba (Assassin) sent to assassinate Sun Zhi appeared on both sides. During the encounter, the astronomical phenomenon suddenly changed, the situation changed suddenly, and the fate arranged the two of them to the modern "Zhongguan Village (Zhonggan Village)". Turned into two four-not-like pets, the Zhong family who raised Xiaochun (Sun Zhi) and the Guan family who raised Xiaoba [Ugly Eight Monsters (also: Bully)] [Hong Ba (Assassin)] started fighting against each other. Deduced one story after another reflecting Chinese traditional wisdom.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Ba Bu Xiongmao
synopsis: With "Bab Panda" settled in Chengdu, the latest "Bab Panda" Sichuan Homecoming series will be launched soon. The story tells what the Babu family saw and heard after returning home. Many plots in the film are based on famous tourist attractions in Sichuan and Chengdu, such as Dujiangyan, Wolong Scenic Area, Jiuzhaigou, etc., as well as some cultural customs and arts with local characteristics, such as Chengdu teahouse customs and Chengdu sugar painting culture. , Sichuan Spicy Hot Pot, Lantern Festival... The Babu family will lead the audience to get to know Sichuan and Chengdu. "Babu Panda" will become one of the important carriers to better promote the traditional customs and tourism culture of Sichuan and Chengdu. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Bu Yiyang De Tuzi Yinyue Pian
synopsis: "Different Rabbits" absorbed the latest research results, and received the awards of Liu Feng, professor of communications at the University of Wisconsin, Richard Xu, professor of Harvard Medical School, and the famous American child development psychologist and child education expert Jim. Strong guidance from Dr. Goldfarb, famous American music producer David Xiaodiya, Master of Education in the United States, Rebecca Chen, etc. The teaching content basically covers most of the knowledge points in music enlightenment education(translated from youku)

title: Bu Yiyang De Tuzi Shizi Pian
synopsis: This animation is to prepare children for elementary school and reading picture books. With reference to the "Frequency Statistics of Commonly Used Modern Chinese Characters" compiled by the National Language Work Committee, mainstream children’s picture books, primary school textbooks and textbooks and supplementary textbooks for high-frequency words, about 800 words were selected as the teaching content. After school, children will not have problems with reading and understanding questions, and can effectively self-read picture books. Each episode teaches about 20 characters, 10 of which are key characters, and will be taught in a variety of ways. Each episode contains at least one theme of "good habits, good behavior" education, covering the five main abilities of emotional intelligence: the ability to understand your own emotions, the ability to control your own emotions, the ability to motivate yourself, and the ability to understand other people's emotions. Ability and the ability to maintain harmonious interpersonal relationships. For example, in the 40th episode of "House Full of Love", while teaching Chinese characters, it focuses on educating children to forgive others, be tolerant, and know how to cherish the friendship between friends. They must be rewarded for nothing; helping them is truly caring. (translated from youku)

title: Bu Yiyang De Tuzi Huihua Pian
synopsis: The "Different Rabbit" series of cartoons is the first domestic animated series that meets the "06 Green Animation Standards", and is also the first domestic teaching cartoon designed with interactive principles. In the production of each series, relevant education experts will formulate a scientific and complete syllabus. The teaching goals include both detailed academic goals and detailed emotional intelligence training goals, such as each episode containing at least one theme "Good Habits, Good Behaviors" education covers the five main abilities of emotional intelligence: the ability to understand one's own emotions, the ability to control one's emotions, the ability to motivate oneself, the ability to understand the emotions of others, and the ability to maintain harmonious interpersonal relationships Wait (translated from tenceng)

title: Bu Yiyang De Tuzi Jiyi Pian
synopsis: The "Different Rabbit" series of cartoons is the first domestic animated series that meets the "06 Green Animation Standards", and is also the first domestic teaching cartoon designed with interactive principles. In the production of each series, relevant education experts will formulate a scientific and complete syllabus. The teaching goals include both detailed academic goals and detailed emotional intelligence training goals, such as each episode containing at least one theme "Good Habits, Good Behaviors" education covers the five main abilities of emotional intelligence: the ability to understand one's own emotions, the ability to control one's emotions, the ability to motivate oneself, the ability to understand the emotions of others, and the ability to maintain harmonious interpersonal relationships Wait.(translated from tenceng)

title: Tangshi Gushi
synopsis: Tang poetry is one of the most brilliant and loudest notes in ancient Chinese poetry, and an unprecedented peak in the history of Chinese poetry development. The poems of the Tang Dynasty have gathered into a magnificent river. For thousands of years, the Chinese poetry, songs, fiction and prose have also infiltrated the aesthetic blood of the Chinese nation... The series of cartoons "Tale of Tang Poems" adapted from Tang poems was created by selecting more than a dozen highly representative and influential masterpieces from more than 1,000 poems by more than 100 poets. The film is faithful to the original in terms of ideology and content, and excavates on the basis of poems as a framework to create and enrich the plot, which truly reflects the local customs at the time, the connotation of writing and the poet's ideological realm. The art design of this film has distinctive oriental cultural and national characteristics. The overall style is based on simplicity and elegance. It pays attention to the depiction and expression of the artistic conception of poetry. It fully absorbs the modeling language and drawing techniques in traditional painting. Each episode draws on different His drawing techniques (line drawing, meticulous brushwork, heavy color, light color, freehand brushwork, ink painting, folk New Year paintings, etc.) form a unique style and style, which well reflects the meaning of poetry.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Longmai Chuanqi
synopsis: "Legend of Dragon Vessels-The Story of Ancient Chinese Scientists" is a cartoon describing the stories of a group of scientists with outstanding achievements in ancient my country, showing their perseverance, self-denial and innovative scientific spirit. The two brothers and sisters traveled through time and space, traveled through China's thousand-year history, to witness and protect the scientists who completed the most important scientific achievements of their lives, recovered the fragments, and reunited the dragon veins. (translated from tenceng)

title: Zheng He Xia Xiyang
synopsis: Zheng He is a great navigator in the history of our country and even the history of the world. Seven voyages of the fleet, reaching more than 30 countries and regions in Southeast Asia, the Indian Ocean, the Red Sea, East Africa, etc. The number of ships, the tonnage of the ships, the large number of seafarers, the strict organization and equipment, and the advanced navigation technology The length of the voyage and the great influence were unparalleled in the world at that time. This film takes Zheng He's Seven Sails to the West as the main storyline, uses the unique wisdom, humor and imaginative storylines of cartoons, and colorful pictures to show the image of the nautical group with Zheng He as the core: smart, wise, and ambitious With the courageous navigator Zheng He, the Gangwu general Wu Baisheng, the mysterious fisherman old squid, the bizarre young Tao Tao, the explorer girl Fei Er, the loyal servant He Bide... these characters are combined together, both It embodies the peaceful, open, and exploratory spirit of Zheng He's voyages to the West, and also brings rich storytelling and entertainment to the audience. In the early years of the Ming Dynasty, Ming Chengzu ordered Zheng He to build treasure ships, recruit people, and go to the West. Zheng He gladly took the lead, led a huge fleet to set sail, and embarked on an unprecedented voyage. The treasure ship rides the wind and waves, advances day and night, rushes through the vortex of death, overcomes the tsunami, overcomes the plague and other difficulties, and has made friends with the local indigenous people to eliminate the war between Turkhul and Nansha. The treasure ship headed to Cor Rica. In the process of lack of water and searching for water, it dealt with the pirate leader Malach, and successfully re-entered the siege and reached the destination. In Corrica, Tao Tao happened to encounter Princess Fei Er, and together with Zheng He, he crushed the conspiracy of the Chinese teacher Xia Qi to usurp the throne, healed the terminal illness of the old king with Chinese medicine, defuse the war, established diplomatic relations, and added another fleet New member-Mayfair. On the way back to China, Zheng He learned that the pirate leader Malachi had held a pirate meeting to rob the treasure ship, so he hacked into it and made people entangled in it. The inside and outside should be combined, and the pirates on the island of desperation were completely eliminated. Zheng He has successfully completed the task of opening up sea lanes and establishing friendly relations with other countries. The envoys of various countries and the rare and exotic animals of various countries visiting with the ship also caused national shock and received the emperor's award. However, Zheng He has a regret in his heart, because there is still a wider sea area that he has not reached. The talented and roughly emperor understood Zheng He's intentions and ordered him to prepare to set sail again and spread the Chinese civilization to farther places. Zheng He's fleet set sail again. This is a new journey of pioneering. Death Labyrinth Island, Devil Seas, Magnet Island, and Dark Strait-new challenges have followed one after another. Zheng He's fleet used wisdom and courage to overcome dangers and left the "Zheng He Lighthouse" in the area. , "Zheng He Well"... promoted the exchange of civilizations between China and foreign countries. Finally, they came to a new continent-this is the magical continent of Africa. Zheng He asked the leader if this was the end of the sea, and the leader shook his head. Zheng He suddenly realized that whether he reached the end of the world was no longer important, but the important thing was to find himself. And he will lead the fleet, with the world’s benevolent, benevolent and gentle mind and tolerance, continue to visit those unknown countries, and spread the rain of peace, civilization, science, and friendship to the Western nations. The sea breeze was blowing Zheng He's pale hair, and his fleet set sail again...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Chaoji Fangchengshi
synopsis: In 2015, Formula-X was launched [1] and immediately became one of the most popular motorsports in the world. "Tyler Haze" team (Tyler Haze)-coached by the former Formula One driver Hans (Hans), backed by the world's richest sponsors and top technology support team, not only for two consecutive sessions Continuing to win the Formula Super World Championship, and the top spot in the new Formula Super Championship has long been regarded as something in the bag. Various data indicate that the dominance of the "Taylor Black Lions" team in the super formula car scene seems unshakable... At the same time, former World Formula One champion Sam (Sam), a legendary racing driver in the car industry at the time, led the young team "Fenix ​​Racing" once again as a coach. The car industry is determined to hit the new Super Formula Championship championship; but when the championship comes, the Flygt team is facing various crises such as driver defection, lack of funds and technological resources; at this critical moment of the team’s life and death, Sen accidentally discovered the team’s ownership Trainee maintenance man-Guang is very talented as a racer, and Sen believes that in the race, the ability of the driver always surpasses the technology, which is the key to determining the outcome. So he decided to train Hwang and let Hwang participate in the race as a flying driver. This combination of legendary coaches and genius drivers who love racing but have never set foot on the track, although facing the test of serious problems such as lack of practical experience and shortage of scientific and technological resources, still insists on the goal of the world championship and faces the challenge" "Taylor Black Lion" team dominates the car world. They came to the stadium with their dedication and passion for motorsports, determined to realize this unstoppable dream on this track. In this fierce competition, can extraordinary talents make up for lack of experience? Can teamwork beat high-end technology? In the end, which team will stand out and stand out from the crowd? Beginning with the 5th Super Formula Competition, all answers will be announced by Aguang, Asen and other flying crews one by one!(translated from baidu baike)

title: Chaonu Wawa
synopsis: The super girl doll is a human-shaped cartoon image. She is the spokesperson of the "Super Girl" cartoon image. She is a cute, youthful and fashionable commoner princess with a sweet and lovely voice. At the same time, she has the characteristics of brave, confident, strong, optimistic, and hardworking, which can embody the growth dreams of contemporary girls. (translated from douban)

title: Sirotsumekusa
synopsis: Ao Sirotubaki, who works at "Hanagumi", was living a normal and quiet life as a flower shop owner. However, her twin sister, Beni Sirotubaki, contacts Ao for the first time in six years. What happened to the sisters six years ago, and what do the two reunited talk about? The lives of the sisters begin to move greatly as their feelings intermingle. A shocking one-situation suspense movie developed in the world's first all-cast VTuber !!

title: BeyRaiderz: Shogun
synopsis: In an unknown land, six guardian beasts provide protection and help cities to thrive through battles called BeyRaiderz. An unknown evil arises to take on the six guardian figures, forcing the six to unite. At the end of the battle the land is protected, but the guardians fall into a slumber. This allows many natural disasters to occur, causing the land to lose its beauty and the people to forget about BeyRaiderz battles. As the six guardian beasts begin to awaken, they call on six BeyWarriors from other lands. The six BeyWarriors are each given BeyRaiderz and charged with going from coliseum arena to coliseum arena to battle. Battling enough times will allow the spirits to reawaken, and it can't happen soon enough as the same darkness that caused them to unite is reawakening and threatens to destroy the world once more.

title: BeyWheelz
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.
background: BeyWheelz is a Canadian-Japanese anime series, a spin-off of the series Beyblade.[1] While produced in Japan, the series has yet to be aired in Japanese. Originally commissioned by Nelvana to make up for Beyblade: Metal Fury's shortened season, BeyWheelz is a series of 13 episodes, which is set in an independent continuity. The series is followed by BeyWarriors: BeyRaiderz, which acts as a continuation story for Sho, Jin, and Leon.

title: Xiao Shu Ping Ping
synopsis: Hi, welcome to Happy Village. Our protagonist Ping Ping and his friends live here. There are delicious haha cakes, well-intentioned pranks, terrible troubles, and more importantly, there are happy! As the chef of Haha Bakery, Ping Ping occasionally misses work because of new games. His best friend is Big Head Pig-a genius and an idiot can only be thought of, he is the best example! Pingping’s neighbor, Kolama, is a "true" artist, lonely and arrogant on the surface. Pingping also has a good friend Bae Bae Sheep, a beautiful girl who has taste and loves life...Here shows true friendship and understanding! (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Shu Ping Ping season2
synopsis: season2 of it

title: Xiao Shu Ping Ping season3
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Xiao Shu Ping Ping Zhi Chengyu Dadian
synopsis: Welcome to Happy Village. Our protagonist Ping Ping and his friends live here. There are delicious haha cakes, well-intentioned pranks, scary troubles, and more importantly, happiness! As the chef of Haha Bakery, Ping Ping occasionally misses work because of new games. His best friend is Big Head Pig-a genius and an idiot can only be thought of, he is the best example! Pingping’s neighbor, Kolama, is a "true" artist, lonely and arrogant on the surface. Pingping also has a good friend Bae Bae Sheep, a beautiful girl who has taste and loves life...Here shows true friendship and understanding! (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Shu Ping Ping Zhi Chengyu Dadian season2
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 小鼠乒乒之成语大典 第2季

title: Ke Jian Hao Shiguang
synopsis: The content of the animated version of "Good Time Between Classes" is adapted from the campus sitcom of the same name. The live-action drama is widely acclaimed for its humorous language and the story content close to the story life of middle school students. The animated version will continue to interpret the original campus life . And the form of animation looks more lively and interesting. (translated from douban)

title: Gushi Xuetang
synopsis: The main content of this film is to teach children ancient poems by Bao Gong, Yue Meimei and others. It is an entertaining and fun cartoon based on the ancient poems of elementary school Chinese. (translated from youku)

title: Chengshi Yezhan Pai
synopsis: It tells the story of a group of about one-year-old babies who are dissatisfied with the sloppy king's crazy destruction of the city and the ecological environment and form a field platoon to fight firmly. Kuku, Eins, Boo, Wordy, and Kuku sister Meimei are all naive babies. They live a very happy life in BB City. But the sloppy garbage king who also lives in BB City leads the garbage soldiers he created to often destroy, in an attempt to make the city like the garbage dump they live in, and become their garbage city. The babies were determined to jointly defend BB city, so the city field platoon was established. When the sloppy destroys, the field platoon will inevitably appear, and use their courage and wisdom to fight the sloppy. After a contest between the two sides, each field platoon successfully defeated the sloppy and restored BB City to a clean environment. However, the sloppy still did not give up, and would make a comeback every time, creating new distinctive garbage soldiers, so the urban field platoon took new actions.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Ou Li Niu He Di Rui Yang
synopsis: The film takes the Tibetan yak Ouli and the Tibetan antelope Dirui as the protagonists and tells the story of their participation in sports summer camps between them and their friends Bufei, Douding, Tangli, and Yiwen. Through independent short stories, it reflects the children's love of sports, positive, unity and friendship. The story uses sports as the theme, encouraging parents and children to take part in sports and get in touch with nature. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Huanbao Xiao Weishi
synopsis: The story tells the protagonist Oliniu, Dirui Sheep and their friends in the cultural palace in the forest in many interesting activities, and they have a strong interest in art. Whether it is photography, music, or painting. (translated from bilibili)

title: Soujiu Quan A Hu
synopsis: On May 12, a magnitude 8.0 earthquake occurred in Wenchuan County, Sichuan. In the army participating in the disaster relief, there is a special team, they are search and rescue dogs. A search and rescue dog of a certain engineering regiment of the Beijing Military Region who was in Dujiangyan rescue was in... (translated from bilibili)

title: Kangri Xiao Qibing
synopsis: The story is based on the rocky fate of Huhu and Dandan. A tragic story of blood and fire is filmed in a comedy fashion. The cartoon follows the characteristics of the two brothers. The story tells them that their family was destroyed, dependent on each other, displaced, and dealt with in the bloody wind of the Japanese invasion of China. The wolf den, through the wind and danger, from the isolated and helpless passive resistance, to the little warrior who consciously resists the Japanese, showing the brothers and the Japanese and puppet forces fighting wits and courageous experiences (translated from douban)

title: Makeboluo Lixian Ji
synopsis: The animated TV series "The Adventures of Marco Polo" has 13 episodes, each with 12 minutes. It is a TV series produced by the animated film "Marco Polo Back to Fragrance". The animated film "Marco Polo Back to Fragrance" won the Gold Award at the 11th Cairo International Children's Film Festival and the 41st Czech International Children's Film Festival Jury Award, Outstanding Participating Film Award of the 8th Beijing University Student Film Festival. "The Adventures of Marco Polo" describes a beautiful and moving legend: the descendants of the Italian navigator Marco Polo wore half a gold coin left by their ancestors and went through hardships and obstacles to the ancient Chinese capital of incense and trace their roots. Tracing the source, exploring the mystery, uncovered the mystery of magic gold coins. Finally expelled the devil and restored peace to Xiangdu. The music of this film was written by the famous American composer Chris Manny, with a rigorous structure and magnificent momentum. The six episodes of the film are even more beautiful. At the end of the film, there is an animated dance scene of 2 minutes and 45 seconds, accompanied by a theme singing by a famous American singer, to achieve a perfect artistic effect.(translated from douban)

title: Qiubite Da Nao Shi Er Xingzuo
synopsis: In order to become the protector of the universe, little angel Cupid must steal the twelve constellations within one year, and obtain the "town seat" tokens of each constellation from every teacher in charge of the constellation tokens. Only twelve tokens have been obtained and they have experienced symbolizing humanity. The baptism of the twelve constellations of character traits can be formally appointed as the patron saint of the universe. It is really difficult to get the twelve constellation tokens, because these twelve constellations are located on different planets in the universe. Cupid has to rely on his own ability and wisdom to reach this planet and find the constellations within one month under the time of each constellation. Teachers in the college get their trust or support, and finally get tokens. When he took his pet Di Li into the twelve planets and made trouble with the twelve constellations, and finally seized all the tokens of the twelve constellations, he was about to be appointed as the patron saint of the universe. Disaster and accidentally become the "Eros angel" in charge of human love, and the pet Di Li has also become a bow and arrow for the Eros messenger...()translated from douban

title: Tan Zhang Qi Qi
synopsis: This film tells a piece of detective stories that took place in the animal kingdom: sincere animal citizens live in a peaceful and civilized society, some criminals have many criminal activities that entrap others, and they have been staged since then. An adventurous drama of the battle between good and evil. (translated from douban)

title: Xiao Jie Bie Taoqi
synopsis: This film tells preschool children the common sense of life that needs attention in daily life through the funny stories that Xiaojie, Xiaodi and his friends have in their daily lives. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Wo De Jiayuan
synopsis: In Gaudinia, there is a building called Lapatella. There are a few lively and lovely children living in it. They are Wu Gang, Lu Xin and Meng Guang. These three children are innocent, lively and imaginative. Often like pranks. Unfortunately, there is a ill-intentioned chimney on the roof of this building. He always wants to destroy the building. From time to time, he has trouble with the witch Song Linyan. 　　 Song Linyan, who was far away from the city, was ambitious and planned to invade again and again in an attempt to rule Gaudinia. The funny little Marin, the stupid flying elephant team, the weird hahalon, and the insidious viper are all Song Linyan's soldiers. Under the leadership of the evil Song Linyan, they frequently compete with the children. Many thrilling and interesting stories. (translated from douban)

title: Weiba Menghuan Qu
synopsis: "Tail Fantasy" mainly tells the story of three small friends from the countryside who came to a strange city together, helped each other for their dreams, lived together to deal with various difficulties, and finally realized their ideals in life. (translated from douban)

title: Weiba Menghuan Qu Zhi Baike 150 Wen
synopsis: The 150 Questions of Encyclopedia of "Tail Fantasy Song" mainly includes one knowledge point and one question in each episode. Through three animal friends, happy rabbits, bastards, dangling and other easy and humorous dialogues, exaggerated and outrageous plots, and telling easy-to-understand encyclopedia knowledge, to answer questions about encyclopedia knowledge, so that the audience can obtain encyclopedia knowledge at the same time , To feel relaxed and happy, is an encyclopedia of entertaining and entertaining cartoons.(translated from tenceng)

title: Long Taizi
synopsis: Mainly tells about the growth experience of our animation star Long Prince. Here are the stories that children have experienced, not experienced, and dreamed of. 　　 The Dragon Prince was sent to the heart of the earth by the Dragon King-a beautiful small village to live alone, where the evil boss wants to let the world be shrouded in darkness. In order to achieve this goal, he sent monsters and crows to invade this beautiful village. The dragon prince who was originally rebellious began to grow up gradually. He began to understand the importance of friendship and the power of unity. Long prince united with his friends around him, using wisdom and courage to resist the invasion of monsters and crows and defend the village! 　　 The "Dragon Prince" short film series expresses the process of the gradual growth and perfection of Long Prince's character and personality through interesting short stories connected with the theme and combined with reality. In the setbacks and failures, Prince Long continued to learn a lot of knowledge and principles of life that are not in books.(translated from douban)

title: Long Taizi Zhi Yinhe Da Maoxian
synopsis: The story revolves around the life, study, and exploration of Long Prince and his friends in the Tiangong Academy of the outer space station and the universe. Through five successive and interrelated chapters, it describes the steps of Long Prince in the Academy. The story of growing up and finally saving the world from the evil Dark Lord. This work adds a large number of high-tech design elements on the basis of the classics, allowing the audience to unknowingly understand the scientific knowledge in the fields of astronomy and aerospace while enjoying the wonderful plot. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Long Taizi Zhi Yanre Xingqiu Zhi Mi
synopsis: The story happened after the decisive battle last season, when Prince Long and his friends returned to Tiangong College and started a normal campus life. At the same time, there is a strange planet known for its heat in the distant southern galaxy, and deep in the heart of the earth there is an evil great demon that is about to be resurrected, the God of Fire. After a struggle, Prince Long finally defeated the Flame God with the help of his companions. The hot planet restored its former calm. Prince Long bid farewell to the aborigines again and ended this thrilling trip to the hot planet. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 龙太子之炎热星球之谜

title: Assault Lily Mini Anime
synopsis: Mini anime featuring characters from the Assault Lily franchise.

title: Huanbao Jian
synopsis: In 2020, there will be more and more garbage on the earth. With the advancement of industrial technology and the development of science and technology, some scientific and technological garbage that looks clean but is actually more harmful will be produced. In one corner of the earth, a high-grade polluted city headed by the Poor King was born. They secretly used evil means to destroy the natural environment on which mankind depends, and pressed the Lord of Nature on the earth under the Arctic iceberg. Because of the destruction of the Defiled King, some unknown strange diseases are always plagued humans. In order to help people eliminate the Pollution King, the sun god gave the earth a magical sword-the environmental protection sword. The environmental protection sword has the magical ability to recognize and eliminate pollution. However, when the environmental protection sword flies to the earth, there are 9 swords. The sword soul was accidentally knocked apart by the heavily polluted and extremely dense atmosphere. The sword body that lost the soul of the sword flew to the past of the earth through a time tunnel in order to save itself. In 2005, Liangliang, who loves environmental protection, got this environmental protection sword. Only when the sword body and the sword soul are combined, the environmental protection sword can exert its power. Liangliang and Duoduo fell through the time tunnel to the boundary of the polluted city in the future world, facing the evil deeds of the pollution king, facing the nine monsters of the yellow sand monster, smoke dust monster, noise, radiation, sludge and muddy water that endanger mankind, bravely With the help of Duoduo, Xiaolingzi, and Grandpa Shanweng, Liangliang is holding an environmentally friendly sword. He resolutely embarks on the battle to find the soul of the sword and rescue the Lord of Nature.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Guandong Dangpu
synopsis: The story takes place in the late Qing Dynasty, a pawnshop on an ordinary street-"Kandong Pawnshop". A pawnshop team headed by the treasurer Jia Dafang, among them is Duan Jiafu, who runs the hall, a crazy girl who is both financial and miscellaneous, Guo Detie, who is a bodyguard and cook, Xiao Suozi, a liaison man, and the dog "Great God of Wealth." Such a group of people with different temperaments, pitiful and cute, gathered together, experienced various risks and legends in the Guandong pawnshop, tasted the warmth and warmth of the world, experienced family love, and witnessed the toil and happiness of life. (translated from baidu)

title: Qixiang Bai Wen
synopsis: The beautiful Forest Village suffered a huge meteorological disaster. After this meteorological disaster, the residents of Forest Village, such as Little Fox, Big Bend Dragon, Little Bee, and Skinny Monkey, deeply realized the lack of meteorological knowledge and the impact on weather changes. ... (translated from bilibili)

title: Jiayan Mama
synopsis: The protagonist Jia Yan was once a famous film star in Hong Kong in the 1960s and was known as one of the seven martial arts princesses. With the changes of the times, the seven young girls of that year now have their own lives. And Jia Yan became a single mother (translated from bilibili)

title: Xiqu Dongman
synopsis: Opera animation is a Chinese style of animation. Mainly based on Chinese opera as the background of animation. The specific cartoon characters are opera characters. The scene can be customized. 　　 The creation method is the same as that of general animation comics. The script is a very important part. Generally, it is mainly based on the plot of Chinese opera. Perform animation creation. 　　 This play interprets Chinese opera in the form of stop motion animation, which has extremely high artistic value. (translated from douban)

title: Fei Mao Shou Gou Jingling Shu
synopsis: The story takes place in a village in the south. The fat cat, the thin dog, and the elf mouse are a group of grudge enemies. Fat cats have a hunting desire for elf mice, and have a deep hatred for skinny dogs for protecting elf mice. The elf mouse is small in size, but there are always many crooked ways to use the power of others to protect itself. Thin dogs are simple-minded, and love takes advantage. The three performed a farce of life. But when they encounter foreign enemies, they will join forces to resist like brothers. The struggle between them and the three young men such as the wolf dog in the village has never stopped. The story revolves around these conflicts between justice and injustice, character and interest. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Jinsihou Shenyou Shuxiang Wangguo
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Waitan 520
synopsis: "The Bund 520" aroused great interest from film buyers in Japan, Europe, Hong Kong and Taiwan with its unique urban style. The name of the film is full of urban atmosphere. The so-called "520", which means "I love you". The entire series is aimed at employees of an advertising company in Shanghai, and portrays the life of urban white-collar workers in group portraits. The characters in the film are full of personality, the picture is rich in color, and the soundtrack is mainly jazz blues, which is very close to the real life of young people in Shanghai. (translated from douban)

title: Anna De Gushì
synopsis: This is a story about a little girl who is very talented in telling stories. Therefore, her friends are fascinated by her and are brought into the mysterious world by her story. Mythological stories are priceless wealth and suitable reading materials for every group. Just as the rope entwined with the treasure was slowly untied, mythological stories began to be spread around the world, first through oral transmission, and later some were included in books and became part of traditional culture. However, there are still a lot of stories not known by people. Many stories are still "sleeping", waiting to be "awakened" by people. They need someone who loves storytelling to bring them into life, and tell these stories to children who simply love to listen to stories. Young people are always willing to see the world with such a perspective between reality and imagination. (translated from douban)

title: Tianwai Fuxing Zhi Chi Jian Chuanqi
synopsis: The film describes a legendary story that happened in a small town called Lotte in ancient China. In order to protect his homeland, the kind-hearted young orphan Tianfu defeated the incoming moon beast without fear of danger, and the whole village was happy. Yan Zhentian of Zhentian Escort was very appreciative of Tianfu, and sent him to transport darts to "Tianwaitianwaitian". The Baogongmiao family who had been following the young master loyally followed helplessly. No one knows that Yan Zhentian is standing at the pier, his face is gloomy, and he secretly smiles... What will happen to the fate of young Tianfu? What kind of difficulties will he encounter on his journey? Can he deliver the darts and return safely? Let the "Legend of the Red Sword of the Fortune Star" tell you one by one.(translated from douban)

title: Xinjing
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Ludang Jin Jian
synopsis: "The Golden Arrow of Ludang" is a long-form serial cartoon with historical themes, adapted from the novel "The Golden Arrow of Ludang" by Jin Zenghao, vice chairman of the Suzhou Writers Association and a famous children’s literature writer. Wide attention. It mainly tells the story of a group of young heroes in the Changshu area of ​​Jiangsu Province during the Anti-Japanese War. Through the telling of this story, let our young people understand the importance of hard work and simple style, and stimulate their patriotic enthusiasm. 　　 In 1937, the Japanese imperialists launched a full-scale war of aggression against China, the Shanghai War of Resistance broke out, and Changshu fell. The situation of the Anti-Japanese War became extremely difficult and complicated. By May 1939, the New Fourth Army that persisted in the War of Resistance in the Yangcheng Lake area had crossed the river north in order to cope with the overall situation of the War of Resistance against Japan, while a group of wounded soldiers of the New Fourth Army stayed in the Yangcheng Lake area to recuperate. 　　 Jin Duanyang is a duck-herding boy on Yangcheng Lake. He admires the sharpshooter "Flying on the Water" in the military team, and he wants to join the military team and become a flying hero on the water. 　　 met three wanderers in Duanyang, Changshu City: Hu Shun, Rice and Little Brother. They all want to become real martial arts players. They joined the fight against Japan with a hatred of the country. They helped the military team "fly ducks to transport medicine", send information, rescue trafficmen...Duanyang, they grew up in the battle day by day, deducting an evocative juvenile anti-Japanese heroic legend.(translated from douban)

title: Kaixin Sishu
synopsis: Based on the enlightenment readings of ancient Chinese children’s classics, select five famous classics such as "The Analects", "Dizi Gui", "Sanzi Jing", "Hundred Family Names", "Thousand Characters", etc., accurately interpret the original sentences of the works and use animation techniques Create new stories, interpret ancient sayings, and interpret the truths contained therein. The form is novel, simple and simple, and introduces a new form of animated sitcoms, entertaining and guiding children to learn and use, to achieve the best educational effect. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Douya Nongchang
synopsis: Little girl Ni Xiangxiang came to her grandparents’ bean sprout farm during summer vacation, but her peaceful life was disrupted by one thing. A buyer came from a big city and bought almost all the large farms around it. (translated from bilibili)

title: Tonghua Dongwuyuan
synopsis: The content of the cartoon is mostly selected from excellent Chinese and foreign fairy tales and fables, using fairy tales as the carrier and animals as the form of expression, which conforms to the viewing psychology of preschool children. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Baobei Geda Ding Guagua
synopsis: "Baby Pimple Ding Gua Gua" is composed of 52 vivid and interesting stories. The story describes the daily life of a young boy in the big kindergarten class at home and in the kindergarten. He sometimes appears willful, selfish, and not very reasonable, but thanks to the help of his friends, the education of his teachers, and the influence of the whole society, he gradually understands the truth, and strives to be a respectful elder, abiding by discipline, caring for his peers, and self-confidence. Good doll. (translated from douban)

title: Dou Ding De Kuaile Riji
synopsis: This is an interesting three-dimensional origami cartoon, which reflects the small stories in children's daily learning life. 　　The characters are lively and cute, and the plot is humorous. Not only is it popular with children, but it also makes parents smile and recall their childhood.(translated from douban)

title: Bu Bu Xiong
synopsis: The innocent and lively, cheerful little boy Dudu and Bubu Xiong from the magic world, they live happily with many friends. However, the bad guys in the magical world tried to break the happy life of mankind, so Bubuxiong, Dudu and the children went through hardships and defeated the bad guys in the magical world and saved the world. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Jidian Xiao Xinshi
synopsis: Every time a new mobile phone number is opened in the human world, a small messenger dedicated to this number will be born in the messenger workshop. The story of 　　 mainly revolves around the little messenger newcomer's click-and-tap delivery experience. In the busy delivery work, he encountered various difficulties: there are troubles and temptations from the outside world, as well as his own troubles and troubles. Due to Dr. Oolong’s negligence, Kapoda suffered from "congenital fluid allergy" at birth. As a newcomer to the workshop, Kapoda is full of passion for his work and is determined to be an excellent messenger. However, the different views and attitudes of the old messengers to work and the indifferent interpersonal relationship between employees are all different from what Cathy imagined. Facing the various problems that followed, Catap felt powerless, and bumping into walls made him gradually lose himself... 　　 In the process of constantly overcoming difficulties and trying to help the friends around him, Katata found the meaning of sending letters, and he also infected other messengers with his words and deeds. His enthusiasm and sincerity finally touched the long-lost hearts in the workshop, and finally, the whole workshop recovered the long-lost warmth and harmony. (translated from douban)

title: Xi Ge Xi Mei
synopsis: In the south, Meizhou, Guangdong, with the titles of "Hometown of Culture", "Hometown of Football" and "Hometown of Overseas Chinese", is like gestating a thousand years of Hakka culture. In November 2006, an original cartoon character with a strong national imprint: Xige Zi and Ximei were born in China's five rural architecture-Tulou. Their natural desire for performance is fully displayed in "Chinese Hakka". The local accent, nostalgia, local charm, and local scenery in the play have fully gained the world 1 Hundreds of millions of Hakka people’s emotional identity. Outside the theater, they are more interpreting modern urban love stories of "strong women and weak men"... Their chat expressions are on MSN, QQ and animation works on major professional and Hakka websites Widely popular and reprinted, forming the "come of the Condor Heroes" on the Internet... (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xi Ge Xi Mei special :Kejia Niang Jiu De Youlai
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Shujia Shang De Qimiao Shijie
synopsis: This film is an in-depth interpretation of a series of classic collections circulated in ancient and modern my country. Divided into several aspects such as ancient poetry and poetry, famous prose, ancient popular literature, ancient poetry, philosophers' works and religious teachings, etc., select representative stories that meet the taste of modern people and interpret them in the form of animation , Make it easier to understand, in order to achieve the ultimate goal of promoting our traditional culture. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Yundong Xiao Fuxing
synopsis: There are a large number of sports in this new series, from team and individual sports based on endurance, to the Olympics and Olympic spirit, and interspersed with some disabled sports. The structure of this new series is 52 animated short stories. It will take children into various sports, from their purpose to their basic concepts, so that they understand the true meaning of athletes. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Chong Sanbao
synopsis: Fengfeng, Anna, and Beetle Cubs are three different classes of insects living in the forest world. They are naughty and cute. Although they have small willful problems, they are pure and kind in heart. Because of their different personalities, there will occasionally be some small conflicts between them. While everyone helps each other, they also like to make some small pranks to tease each other. When facing the big bad guys Xue Da and Luo Qi, the three small partners united and used their collective wisdom to make the forest world still maintain the happiness and peace of the past. In the life of the forest, they constantly met new friends, produced new stories, gained wisdom when facing and solving the problems in life again and again, and re-recognized themselves. The whole cartoon is full of childish fun, entertaining and teaching. Through a light-hearted story, it shows the themes of sincerity, friendliness, solidarity and mutual assistance, so that children can learn to help each other, tolerate each other, and learn in a fairy-tale world. Live in harmony with the surrounding environment.(translated from youku)

title: Qiaoqiaoban
synopsis: Each episode of the "Seesaw" series of cartoons has a historical character, ranging from emperors, generals, senior officials and nobles to ordinary people. There are industrial patriarchs like Lu Ban and Huang Daopo, scientific geniuses like Li Shizhen and Zhang Heng, and Wen Tianxiang. Loyal ministers and righteous men like Huo Qubing skillfully interpret the excellent traditional virtues of honesty, mutual assistance, labor, and patriotism with modern animation techniques. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Yan Shu Jiemei Kan Shijie
synopsis: This is a classic work full of free and agile life breath, innocence and interest exuding joy and humor. The little mole with a round head and brain is both funny and full of warmth. The thought content is relaxed and the plot is lively and interesting. It has made all children and adults enjoy great happiness and warmth. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Makesi Shuo Jingjiweiji
synopsis: Combining the current domestic and international economic and social life, select hot issues and make them in the form of animation. Enumerate famous cases related to the economic crisis such as "Lehman Brothers" and "Enron" to provide profound and simple explanations. This film will use the principles of Marxist economics to scientifically explain the current international financial and economic crisis, and form its own voice in the international Marxist propaganda community. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Lan Mao Qimeng Yingyu
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Xiaonu Cao E
synopsis: The film is based on Zhejiang local folklore. Through the story of the filial daughter Cao E, it promotes good feelings such as kindness and filial piety. The theme has a strong educational significance. After being expressed in the form of animation, the original picture of the film is exquisite, the tone is soft, the editing is smooth, and the dubbing is beautiful. (translated from iqiyi)

title: E Bao Leyuan
synopsis: In a small town called "Goose Castle", there are animals such as geese, bears, old tortoises, bunny and pigs. They lead a peaceful and happy life, but with the birth of "babies", Growing up, the peaceful life of animals is broken, children’s education, neighborhood relations and small town life have changed...Although it is a cartoon, it reflects today’s rapidly changing society and inspires people to think deeply about life (translated from iqiyi)

title: BeyWheelz
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.
background: BeyWheelz is a Canadian-Japanese anime series, a spin-off of the series Beyblade.[1] While produced in Japan, the series has yet to be aired in Japanese. Originally commissioned by Nelvana to make up for Beyblade: Metal Fury's shortened season, BeyWheelz is a series of 13 episodes, which is set in an independent continuity. The series is followed by BeyWarriors: BeyRaiderz, which acts as a continuation story for Sho, Jin, and Leon.

title: Qiu Pao Senlin
synopsis: The story takes place in the ocean near the earth's equator, on those strange "islands" that are unknown. Some huge old sea turtles have been floating on the sea near the equator for thousands of years. I don't know when it started, plants grew on this raised, huge back shell, and gradually formed a very strange and fun tropical. The tropical rain forest on the ball island is known as the "bulb forest". Some animals have come to live on these ball islands one after another, and everyone eats the spherical fruits unique to the island. "The circle is beauty" has since become the unique aesthetic of Bulb Forest (translated from iqiyi)

title: Dan Dan Zongdongyuan
synopsis: A group of people living on the farm happily live without the eggs that hatch into chicks. But life on Happy Farm is not stable, and there is a weasel who steals eggs often visits this farm. The eggs of the farm protect themselves with their transforming skills. The struggle between eggs and weasels is staged on this farm every day (translated from baidu)

title: Doshi Miao Qitan
synopsis: A story about the cat demons Nighteye and William who, through trading with humans, absorb the soul of the trader to increase their life span via cultivation and become immortal. In these transaction, interesting stories happen with Hong Yu, Lan Ling and others. (Source: ManhuaTai)

title: Wanpi Fu Duo
synopsis: In a beautiful coastal city, at the foot of the green hills, surrounded by mountains and the sea, lives a young boy who is innocent, playful, active and fanciful. He is the protagonist-Fudo. The story happened around some interesting things about Fodor both inside and outside the school. The whole play firmly grasps the naughty and naughty personality of Fodor, uses comic art language and spans time and space, surreal, and romantic expression techniques to deduce the ups and downs, suspense and cuteness of the story.(translated from tenceng)

title: Enen no Shouboutai Mini Anime
synopsis: Mini anime featuring chibi characters from Enen no Shouboutai, streamed on the official Twitter account.

details.Japanese: 炎炎ノ消防隊 ミニアニメ

title: 2.43: Seiin Koukou Danshi Volley-bu Mini Anime
synopsis: Mini anime introducing the characters, released on the official Twitter.

details.Synonyms: 2.43: Seiin High School Boys Volleyball Team Mini Anime
details.Japanese: 2.43 清陰高校男子バレー部 ミニアニメ
